entry.title: Bitcoin Knots 0.19.0.1.knots20200104 released
entry.summary: Bitcoin Knots has released version 0.19.0.1.knots20200104, which includes new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements, as well as updated translations. Users are encouraged to report bugs using the issue tracker on GitHub and subscribe to receive security and update notifications. The release notes and change log are available on GitHub. Notably, this version enables BIP157 (Neutrino) to serve compact block filters to peers, expands PSBT support to include new fields and easier usage from the GUI for watch-only wallets, and adds an experimental feature to the Overview tab that allows users to hide private information. Suggestions for improving this feature can be made on the related Core PR.
